General.Name: Tidehold Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. engages in the international trade business in Taiwan. It is also involved in rental, sale, and development of residential buildings. In addition, it offers passenger cars for rent and operates gas-electric garbage truck business. Tidehold Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 75, Taipei Yanping South Road, Taipei, Taiwan
